Reviews.Title: “Please take the time to look elsewhere!”
Reviews.Author: MaryEAmon
Reviews.Content: situated close termini believe found location deal looked throughly bathroom awful mildew falling apart days journey hot muggy rome hot water heater broken shower compensation inquire staff blew concern bottled water guest replied flat gas available guest overly generous water bill worst beds sinking middle pushed singles 4 night stay am creature habit falling asleep heavy arm handsome beloved absolute comfortable allthe beds sagged try snuggle beds moved apart staff nice conditions wifi free house computer didnt cart ours trip breakfast everyday understanding breakfast meal italians understanding vast improved rolls stale packaged cookies wafers low quality coffee worst possibly imagine incredible italian coffee boxed corn flakes warm milk total breakfast guaranteed blood sugar crashing head ache pounding dehydrated start journey history thick rome start slept comfortably bathed actually photos mold bathroom cant load decided ahead reviews posted

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Price”
Reviews.Author: aviator44
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel igea 1 night beginning tour booked northern italy rome expensive affordable clean walking distance sights 3 min termini station convenient staff helpful providing map directing sightseeing generous allowing bagged breakfast tour leaving earlier breakfast kept extra baggage extra fee 5 day tour please note youre traveling europe expecting star rating hotels north america unfair expectations hotel elevator beds basic pillowtop mattress means accept hotel europe paying double hotel north america expected consider hotel cleaner holiday inns comfort inns ive stayed free computer wifi lobby compare hotel hardpressed cheaper definately stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Low value for money”
Reviews.Author: Daniella S
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights hotel near termini station 5 min walking lots restaurants foot using metro staff friendly hardly speaks english breakfast ok fruits beside croissants cornflakes sweet breads bathroom leaking ceiling fixed day considering hotels stayed europe expensive compare quality breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel In good location but noisy at the mornings”
Reviews.Author: ZoharLerman
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel trip rome hotel reasonably ok noisy mornings location near rome station recommend using metro staff nice friendly internet lobby

Reviews.Title: “Noisy place.. Ok for short stays”
Reviews.Author: mundiani
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night rome hotel reasonably ok noisy evenings location near rome station staff ok waiter breakfast grumpy hot chocolate ok short stays looking economical option

Reviews.Title: “Clean basic hotel - a good base for Rome.”
Reviews.Author: UKChris82
Reviews.Content: booked short break rome £80 night deal worth hence 4 star rating based value money hotel located near station base getting despite heart action colloseo 1015 mins walk historic centre slightly willing walk metro st peters morning tour base yes noise outside windows breeze city isnt noisy sort air con shutters completely black wish close clean youll spend little time doesnt matter beds firm continental hotels 2 beds pushed oppose double lift 70s stops mid level carry luggage updown flight stairs breakfast poor cornflakes bread coissants juice coffee youd expect fruit continental meats worth watchout free wifi reception hotel clean makeover update repairs air con worth rating

Reviews.Title: “basic hotel, good friendly staff, get what you pay for!”
Reviews.Author: nottslucy
Reviews.Content: hotel igea 5 mins walk station location lot sites walking jumping underground noisy streets night couldnt shut windows due air conditioning hotel basic budget hotel clean bathroom nice hot powerful shower breakfast little basic fresh bread rolls cornflakes cereals staff friendly helpful criticism air conditioning didnt enquired told wasnt hot hot hot especially night

Reviews.Title: “Noisy but near the stations.”
Reviews.Author: brit1222
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel ba dispute arrived 2 days wedding 2 blocks station location street noisy restaurants diners set numerous car alarms shouting singing sessions 4 am restaurants chucking empty bottles throwing rubbish friend rear content tour touts nuisance 30 euros extra reckon jump main 60 minute queues st peters admission free normally chapel museums entry 15 euros getting

Reviews.Title: “Good Hospitality, centrally located. Noise on street side room.”
Reviews.Author: amitamr
Reviews.Content: igea hotel centrally located near termini station gentleman reception helpful helped appreciate facing street noise lots disturbance street air conditioning ok break fast
